xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/58955-Avia: Vampire Hunter 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/je0Y8iiX5tFIfrccblerfAiCydX.jpg Where Buffy leaves off, Avia Richards the vampire huntress begins. Avia wages a tireless one-woman war against the evil demons hidden among us who live to feed on the next unsuspecting victim. Armed only with a samurai sword, Avia dauntlessly hunts down the bloodsuckers, putting her life on the line in a daily do-or-die battle. But Avia's personal demons often seem to cast a longer shadow than the monstrous foes she fights. Avia: Vampire Hunter
